import React from 'react'; import { Code, Layout, Palette } from 'lucide-react'; function Home() { return (
{/* Hero Section */}

John Doe

Web Developer & Designer

Get in Touch
{/* Introduction */}

Welcome to my digital space! I'm a passionate web developer with 5 years of experience in creating responsive and user-friendly websites. My expertise lies in crafting seamless user experiences with cutting-edge technologies.

{/* Skills/Services */}

Web Development

Crafting robust and scalable web applications using modern frameworks and best practices.

Responsive Design

Creating fluid layouts that adapt seamlessly to any device or screen size.

UI/UX Design

Designing intuitive and visually appealing interfaces for enhanced user experiences.

); } export default Home;
